item.description:
ITS WAS GREAT LAST YEAR!!

VERY INTIMATE, HELP OPENNING THE SEASON AT A WONDERFUL, UNIQUE CAMP, GET TO KNOW SOME STAFF MEMBERS, WORK TOGETHER ON A FARM, CONSTRACTION, GARDENING, OR HOUSE PREPS...FOOD IS ABSOLUTELY OUTSTANDING!

SWIM IN ALAKE..WALK/HIKE/BIKE AROUND...READ, PLAY GAMES, MUSIC...DISCUSS/DEBATE....EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO FEEL ALIVE AND WORTHY...

DIRECTORS OF THE CAMP, ANDY AND ANDREA ARE MORE THEN WELCOMING YOU TO JOIN THIS SPECIAL WORK FOR STAY AND PLAY. THEY ARE ASKING FROM YOU 4 HRS/A DAY OF VOLUNTEER, IN RETURN YOU GET A RUSTIC LODGING, AND MEALS. AND ALL THAT CENTER OFFERS PRESEASON...PLEASE BRING YOUR OWN LINENS/SLIPPING GEAR, BUG REPPELANT, SUN SCREEN, WATER BOTTLE, WORKING WEAR, GLOVES, WORKING SHOES, HAT, AND NICE YOURSELF.

DETAILS WILL FOLLOW SHORTLY. STAY AS MUCH AS YOU CAN/WANT. A MEMORIAL WEEKEND, OR DAY/TWO,

MY CELL 781-718-6203 MAIA

SEE YOU SOON!!
item.why: ITS GREAT! NATURE, FRIENDS, GOOD FOOD, PHYSICAL WORK, INTELLECTUAL STIMULATION...

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: WORLD FELLOWSHIP CENTER
